name: pigallery2
description: PiGallery2 is a fast static gallery generator and viewer designed for hosting image collections on a server or NAS. It offers hierarchical browsing, tagging, and a responsive UI.

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Generate static gallery pages for fast loading without server-side processing

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Navigate photos organized by folder structure with breadcrumb navigation

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Tag photos with keywords, people, and locations for organized searching

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Adapts to different screen sizes for optimal viewing on desktop, tablet, and mobile

features.title: Video Support
features.description: Play video files alongside photos with HTML5 video player integration

features.title: Search Functionality
features.description: Find photos by tags, dates, locations, and other metadata fields
